messages.content: hey, i have a question about visa requirements for israelis, i am currently going back to israel after spending some time in sinai
Of course! I'll do my best to help. What specifically do you need to know about visa requirements for Israelis?
when can i return to sinai?

As an Israeli citizen, you will need to obtain a visa from the Egyptian embassy in Tel Aviv before traveling to Sinai. The visa will allow you to stay in Sinai for a limited period of time. 

However, it's important to note that the Israeli government currently advises against all non-essential travel to the Sinai Peninsula due to security concerns. It is recommended that you follow the travel advice provided by your government and exercise caution if you do decide to travel to Sinai. 

You may also want to check with the Egyptian embassy in Tel Aviv or with a travel agency to confirm the latest visa requirements and travel restrictions before planning your trip.
